sid
Success
@/@view/@ExtJs/@viewport/@items/@mainPanel/@buttons/@deleteButton/@handler/@deleteConfrim/@OkFunction/@requestDelete/@Success/@Code
sname
Code
Scode
#$@text#$@
var obj = Ext.decode(response.responseText);

//var ext = document.
var tree = window.parent.Ext.getCmp('xworker_thingTreeWindow_tree');

var node = tree.getNodeById(obj.data.thingPath);
if(node){
    node.remove();
    document.location = 'do?sc=xworker.app.view.extjs.xworker.thingEditor.DocControls/@blank';
}
#$@text#$@
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Function/@Code

handler
@/@view/@ExtJs/@viewport/@items/@mainPanel/@buttons/@addChildButton/@handler/@Code
sname
setThingPath
Scode
#$@text#$@
var thingPath = '${thing.getMetadata().getPath()}';

var xr = window.parent.Ext.ns('Ext.xworker.remote');
xr.openWindow('XWorker_ThingAddChildWindow', 
    'do?sc=xworker.app.view.extjs.xworker.thingEditor.XWorker_ThingAddChildWindow&' + 'thingPath=' + thingPath,
    null,
    {
    thingPath: thingPath
});
#$@text#$@

@/@view/@ExtJs/@descriptorWindow/@items/@GridPanel/@buttons/@changeDescButton/@handler/@Code
sname
Code
Scode
#$@text#$@
var url = 'do?sc=xworker.app.view.extjs.xworker.thingEditor.XWorker_ThingEditor';
url = url + '&thingPath=${thing.getMetadata().getPath()}';
url = url + '&descriptor=' + datas[0].get('value');
document.location = url;
#$@text#$@
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Function/@Code
sinheritDescription
